subject: Congratulations
body:

subject: Re: Congratulations
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear that my email address has been selected as a lucky winner in the Powerball America Government Email Lottery! Could you please provide me with more details about this exciting opportunity? I would love to learn more about how I can claim my prize.

Also, I noticed that you mentioned the sum of USD, but the amount seems to be missing. Could you kindly let me know how much I have won? It would be helpful to have all the necessary information so that I can proceed accordingly.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Mary
